      static boolean sameDate(java.sql.Date d1, java.sql.Date d2)

      Attempts to convert a date string into a java.sql.Date

      • stringToDate

        public static java.sql.Date stringToDate(java.lang.String dateString,
                         java.lang.String dateFormat)
        Attempts to convert a date string into a java.sql.Date
        Parameters:
        dateString - The possible date
        dateFormat - The format to parse the date string
        Returns:

      • sameDate

        public static boolean sameDate(java.sql.Date d1,
               java.sql.Date d2)
        Checks if two dates are the same date by checking if they are in the same year and they are the same day of the year.
        Parameters:
        d1 - first date
        d2 - second date
        Returns:
        True if they are on the same day
